hero.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
hero.description: I am a passionate developer creating modern and interactive web experiences.

about.name: Muhammad Rizqi Ramdhani
about.bio: Hello, my name is Rizqi, and I am a student at Bina Mandiri Multimedia Vocational High School. I'm a Web Developer who is still learning and growing in this field, with a bit of experience in web design. Welcome to my portfolio website!

summary.title: Senior High School and Equivalent
summary.sub: Bina Mandiri Multimedia Vocational High School
summary.desc: I am currently attending SMK Bina Mandiri Multimedia while I am at the senior high school level. I am majoring in software engineering. I am a Frontend Developer.

summary.title: Junior High School and Equivalent
summary.desc: I attended SMP Negeri 4 Cileungsi at the junior high school level. At this level, Alhamdulillah, I am almost present every day when the KBM is held. I also sometimes participate in competitions such as the Adhan competition at the sub-district level.

summary.title: Primary School and Equivalent
summary.sub: Cikal Cendekia Integrated Islamic Primary School
summary.desc: I attended SDIT Cikal Cendekia at the elementary / equivalent level. At this level, Alhamdulillah, I always get 1st or 2nd place every year. I also won the first rank / champion in my class at graduation. Then I also often participate in O2SN competitions.

summary.title: Kindergarten and Equivalent
summary.desc: I studied at Al-Komariah Kindergarten. It was a wonderful place where I learned many new things, played with my friends, and joined fun activities like singing, drawing, and storytelling. The teachers were kind and always made learning fun. I have many happy memories from my time at Al-Komariah.

experience.title: OSIS Member
experience.sub: Member of The OSIS Bina Mandiri Multimedia Vocational High School
experience.desc: I served as a member of the state defence section. Here I run the existing programmes.

experience.title: BM3 Championship Safety Committee
experience.desc: I am in charge of the BM3 Championship Security committee. My job is to secure or condition the supporters so that there is no chaos when the event is taking place.
